body: This e-commerce website provides a seamless shopping experience for men's and women's clothing. It features a clean, user-friendly design, responsive layouts, and a dark mode option for more comfortable browsing.
I designed and developed a modern landing page for a real estate agency to showcase their properties and make it easy for potential buyers to get in touch.

This dashboard lets you easily manage your products, add, edit, or delete items with just a few clicks. It also features charts for tracking data and a dark mode option for a comfortable user experience.
